verbs.description: President Donald Trump , in a series of tweets Wednesday morning , [V: is] slamming what he now calls " spygate . "
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] , [ARGM-LOC: in a series of tweets Wednesday morning] , is [V: slamming] [ARG1: what he now calls " spygate] . "
President Donald Trump , in a series of tweets Wednesday morning , is slamming [ARG1: what] [ARG0: he] [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: calls] [ARG2: " spygate] . "
